documents.document:
@CraigMacBride Tried the stationary version of this technique today and yesterday; can confirm that it wasn’t much of a distraction.
In other news, my gait is literally 25% of what it normally is and it took me 12 minutes to shuffle the 250 metres between my condo and the streetcar stop. 😭

Advice I've received since putting my back out (again):
Physiotherapist: hourly biased extension exercises, no forward flexion
Dad: Take it easy, work-related stress can trigger flare-ups
Younger sister: watch the Minions movie, it's cute and relaxing

Love, Simon was brilliant.
It would never have been made 10 years ago, so I can only imagine how 14-year-old me would have felt watching a story like mine play out on the big screen.
LGBT youth deserve a movie like this. I'm so grateful that they now have it. 🏳️‍🌈
